Computer.name: T3 Test Node
Computer.file:
T3 Test Node — V3 Cracks ========================== Ports: V3 PF: ssh_v3(22) ftp_v3(21) web_v3(80) Vanilla: none
Key files required (already in your /home for M1 testing): ssh_v3_key.dat ftp_v3_key.dat web_v3_key.dat
Test sequence: SSHcrack_v3 22 opens ssh_v3 (cyan matrix, ~15s, needs key) FTPBounce_v3 21 opens ftp_v3 (packets anim, ~15s, needs key) WebServerWorm_v3 80 opens web_v3 (matrix anim, ~15s, needs key) probe verify all V3 ports open
Fallback test (SSHcrack_v2 on V3 node): SSHcrack_v2 22 no ssh_v2 here — falls back to ssh_v3 logs: "[GP] escalating target: ssh_v2 -> ssh_v3" succeeds here (9999s trace); needs buffs on real nodes.
No proxy. No firewall. Trace will not fire.
